long_description: You may have seen the pro-bike car bumper stickers: "Give cyclists 3 feet of space." Now spread your Share the Road philosophy by wearing the men's Canari 3 Feet Bike Jersey. Jersey has "Share the Road" written on the back. Full-length front zipper allows easy on/off and plenty of venting options. Soft, lightweight polyester fabric excels at wicking moisture and offers UPF 30 sun protection. Triple back pocket features double-sided reflective tape for added visibility in low light. Raglan sleeves eliminate shoulder seams for increased range of motion and comfort. Canari 3 Feet Bike Jersey for men features a tall collar to protect the neck from wind and sun.
short_description: You may have seen the pro-bike car bumper stickers: "Give cyclists 3 feet of space." Now spread your Share the Road philosophy by wearing the men's Canari 3 Feet Bike Jersey.
